trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Peyton
There were no other sightings in Peyton on or around September 24th 2011
Summary: i was at school playing tag when i saw a dull white dot hovering under a C-130,
divs: Sighting DetailsI was playing tag at school when I saw a sphere or circle hovering under a C130. It was hovering at an obtuse angle without the points . It was moving in a curved line pattern. It lasted for only a few minutes, less than 5. When we went inside for lunch, it was still moving very slowly. It could have only been two things, a plane called the super hornet or a UFO. As we went inside, that was the last that I saw.
